description.value:
Trigger The desk switch is pressed or the trapdoor is opened

Effect The charge on the door explodes. All creatures within 10 feet take [[/r {(2d10+6)[fire],(1d10+3)[piercing]}]]{2d10+6 fire damage and 1d10+3 piercing damage}, and [[/r 1d6[bleed]]] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:22|basic:true]). The room is filled with steam, making all creatures within the room @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed]. The trap then rolls initiative.

stealth.details: (trained) to find the desk switch; @Check[type:perception|dc:28|traits:action:seek] (expert) to find the trapdoor and charge

details.description: A blackâ€‘powder charge fastened to a trapdoor (marked with a "T" on the map) blows a hole in a steam tunnel, filling the room with superheated steam.
details.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:18|traits:action:disable-a-device] (trained) to disarm the desk switch; @Check[type:thievery|dc:28|traits:action:disable-a-device] (expert) to disarm the trapdoor charge
details.routine:
(1 action) The trapdoor emits a jet of superheated steam. Each creature in the room must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes [[/r (1d10+3)[fire]]] damage.

Failure The creature takes [[/r (2d10+6)[fire]]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Blinded] for 1 round.

Critical Failure The creature takes [[/r (2d10+6)[fire]]] damage, is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Fatigued], and is blinded for 1 round.
